title: Support multiple versions of a converted app in the store
body:
We have a server / cloud backend as part of our product. Each costumer may run a different version of this backend software.
We have to provide different versions of our client application at the same time as converted app in the store.
Project Centennial and the Store for Windows desktop apps MUST support versioning of a app.

comments.body: Can you please explain the scenarios a bit more?

This is also important for us, but for a different reason. Our (business) users collect and process data in our app. They must be able to control the version they are using because they must be certain the data is collected and processed in the same way. Sometimes our customers are required by law or company procedures to validate the systems that they use, so changing to a different version for them is unacceptable.
